item.title: 3M CO 10-K
item.description: 3M CO, which is in the Surgical & Medical Instruments & Apparatus [3841] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 08, 2023 had 49608 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 739 instances 3m - 734 instances 2022 - 577 instances 2021 - 358 instances related - 332 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
